thought: This URL may be a scam website. I should check the page source as well as the DNS records.
observation: Triaster | Beautifully Engineered Improvement Software  This website stores cookies on your computer. These cookies are used to collect information about how you interact with our website and allow us to remember you. We use this information in order to improve and customize your browsing experience and for analytics and metrics about our visitors both on this website and other media. To find out more about the cookies we use, see our Privacy Policy. If you decline, your information won’t be tracked when you visit this website. A single cookie will be used in your browser to remember your preference not to be tracked. Accept Decline What we sell Licensed Software Process Library Ask The Crowd MyTime Services Enterprise Bespoke Development View All > Improvement Guides The A-Z Guide to Business Process Management The Complete Guide to Continuous Improvement in Business The Ultimate Guide to Business Process Mapping Resources White Papers Case Studies Blog About Our Story Join Our Team Affiliated Companies Support Partner s Programme Site Search Contact Process Management and Business Improvement for All Our Flagship Solutions The complete software solutions to business process management Find out more Improve your products and services with feedback from customers and colleagues Self-service flexi-time and absence tracking, designed for today's flexible working practices All Our Solutions Process & Quality Management Product and Service Improvement Flexi-time & Absence Management Something Bespoke? Empower your team, manage your processes and cut out business waste... more > Bring your processes to life... Empower and motivate your team, whilst capturing accurate records... When you can't find the software solution you need... Enterprise Services The Triaster Podcast Listen for free to The Triaster Podcast, where Giles Green chats to a whole host of members of the wonderful Triaster community about a wide range of topics. Topics covered so far include: Process Mapping what it is, how it is done and why you should do it with Paul Elson-Vining How to get your company using your Business Management System An interview with Matt Burrowes and Sam Light about their roles at Triaster over the years We are always looking to improve the Triaster podcast. If you have any ideas for what you want us to discuss in our episodes or who we should talk to (including you!) please get in touch Listen Now We really care about our customers - they don’t just use our software & services, they join a fantastic Triaster Community Triaster are a joy to work with, always supportive and a great help when developing system functionality and improvements. Collins Aerospace Actuation Systems It has been such a seamless and enjoyable experience working with Triaster. From understanding process maps, through to the training on map creation and BMS management and down to the design.  Triaster have been able to incorporate all of my ideas and have helped me to embody Fotech’s vision! FOTECH SOLUTIONS Thank you and Triaster for all your support over the years. It’s a pleasure working with such a customer-focused company. LANDMARC SUPPORT SERVICES I’ve worked with Triaster for a little over 8 years and I’ve always found them friendly and helpful...technical support has been provided to us by a familiar team who have very good knowledge of our management system and are able to quickly address any issues. thought: The DNS records show that the website is hosted by UMIS, a UK-based hosting provider. The company information on the website matches the information in the DNS records. I now know the final answer.
